body:

I'm sorry my English is not good.
it is not a patch or CL, it is just a issue.
how to fix it, I do not care.

JUST for a io.Reader, I think the result is not correct
```
----------------------------------------

0 EOF

----------------------------------------

0 http: request body too large

----------------------------------------

0 EOF

```
